headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CARR, LEONARD D.

snippet: CARR--Leonard D.,died peacefully at the age of 93 on Friday, February 26th. He was a devoted husband for more than 50 years to the late Helen K. Carr, beloved and proud father of Eugene V. Carr and Anita Carr Shapiro, loving father-in-law to Harvey Shapiro, wonderful brother to Robert Carr and great friend to many. His incredible strength, kindness, warmth, devotion and keen sense of humor will be greatly missed. Funeral Services will be held on Monday, February 29th, 11am at Temple Israel, 112 East 75th St. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Temple Israel, New York City. 1/3
